item.title: Post: Engineer Noises
item.content:encoded:
My response when people ask me what I do for a living

Spent some time playing TOEM this evening. Very relaxing. Met an artist later in the game. Did not like him.

item.title: Post: Working on Breadcrumbs
item.description: once again, the pic is irrelevant but Jumpy Dog sure is cute Starting a new job on Monday, which is pretty exciting. Also, figured out a whole bunch of breadcrumb and timeline stuff for the site, starting from a shortcode example I never noticed in the card/Hugo documents before. Hoping I finish before I get all distracted on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
once again, the pic is irrelevant but Jumpy Dog sure is cute

Starting a new job on Monday, which is pretty exciting. Also, figured out a whole bunch of breadcrumb and timeline stuff for the site, starting from a shortcode example I never noticed in the card/Hugo documents before.

Hoping I finish before I get all distracted on Monday.

item.title: Post: At last I have a mission statement
item.description: The stress ball lasted four days under my stress load, but the reader board is a Christmas present that will keep on giving. LESS CODE
item.content:encoded:
The stress ball lasted four days under my stress load, but the reader board is a Christmas present that will keep on giving.

LESS CODE

item.title: Post: I should be sleeping
item.description: — but I’m real curious to explore. This is my world the next couple of weeks, sleeping near the red dot on the right, and working by that star to the left: Coffee Meets Bagel headquarters.
item.content:encoded: — but I’m real curious to explore. This is my world the next couple of weeks, sleeping near the red dot on the right, and working by that star to the left: Coffee Meets Bagel headquarters.
